verses.verse: Behold,<WH2009> the day<WH3117> of the LORD<WH3068> comes,<WH935> and your spoil<WH7998> shall be divided<WH2505> in the middle<WH7130> of you.

For I will gather<WH622> all<WH3605> nations<WH1471> against<WH413> Jerusalem<WH3389> to battle;<WH4421> and the city<WH5892> shall be taken,<WH3947> and the houses<WH1004> rifled,<WH8155> and the women<WH802> ravished;<WH7693> and half<WH2677> of the city<WH5892> shall go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> into captivity,<WH1473> and the residue<WH3499> of the people<WH5971> shall not be cut<WH3772> off from the city.<WH5892>
Then shall the LORD<WH3068> go<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> and fight<WH3898> against those<WH1992> nations,<WH1471> as when<WH3117> he fought<WH3898> in the day<WH3117> of battle.<WH7128>

And his feet<WH7272> shall stand<WH5975> in that day<WH3117> on the mount<WH2022> of Olives,<WH2132> which<WH834> is before<WH5921> <WH6440> Jerusalem<WH3389> on the east,<WH6924> and the mount<WH2022> of Olives<WH2132> shall split<WH1234> in the middle<WH2677> thereof toward the east<WH4217> and toward the west,<WH3220> and there shall be a very<WH3966> great<WH1419> valley;<WH1516> and half<WH2677> of the mountain<WH2022> shall remove<WH4185> toward the north,<WH6828> and half<WH2677> of it toward the south.<WH5045>

And you shall flee<WH5127> to the valley<WH1516> of the mountains;<WH2022> for the valley<WH1516> of the mountains<WH2022> shall reach<WH5060> to Azal:<WH682> yes, you shall flee,<WH5127> like as you fled<WH5127> from before<WH6440> the earthquake<WH7494> in the days<WH3117> of Uzziah<WH5818> king<WH4428> of Judah:<WH3063> and the LORD<WH3068> my God<WH430> shall come,<WH935> and all<WH3605> the saints<WH6918> with you.
And it shall come<WH1961> to pass in that day,<WH3117> that the light<WH216> shall not be clear,<WH3368> nor dark:<WH7087>

But it shall be one<WH259> day<WH3117> which<WH1931> shall be known<WH3045> to the LORD,<WH3068> not day,<WH3117> nor<WH3808> night:<WH3915> but it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that at evening<WH6153> time<WH6256> it shall be light.<WH216>

And it shall be in that day,<WH3117> that living<WH2416> waters<WH4325> shall go<WH3318> out from Jerusalem;<WH3389> half<WH2677> of them toward<WH413> the former<WH6931> sea,<WH3220> and half<WH2677> of them toward<WH413> the hinder<WH314> sea:<WH3220> in summer<WH7019> and in winter<WH2778> shall it be.
And the LORD<WH3068> shall be king<WH4428> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> the earth:<WH776> in that day<WH3117> shall there be one<WH259> LORD,<WH3068> and his name<WH8034> one.<WH259>

All<WH3605> the land<WH776> shall be turned<WH5437> as a plain<WH6160> from Geba<WH1387> to Rimmon<WH7417> south<WH5045> of Jerusalem:<WH3389> and it shall be lifted<WH7213> up, and inhabited<WH3427> in her place,<WH8478> from Benjamin's<WH1144> gate<WH8179> to the place<WH4725> of the first<WH7223> gate,<WH8179> to the corner<WH6434> gate,<WH8179> and from the tower<WH4026> of Hananeel<WH2606> to the king's<WH4428> winepresses.<WH3342>
And men shall dwell<WH3427> in it, and there shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> utter destruction;<WH2764> but Jerusalem<WH3389> shall be safely<WH983> inhabited.<WH3427>

And this<WH2063> shall be the plague<WH4046> with which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> will smite<WH5062> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that have fought<WH6633> against<WH5921> Jerusalem;<WH3389> Their flesh<WH1320> shall consume<WH4743> away while they stand<WH5975> on their feet,<WH7272> and their eyes<WH5869> shall consume<WH4743> away in their holes,<WH2356> and their tongue<WH3956> shall consume<WH4743> away in their mouth.<WH6310>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass in that day,<WH3117> that a great<WH7227> tumult<WH4103> from the LORD<WH3068> shall be among them; and they shall lay hold<WH2388> every<WH376> one<WH376> on the hand<WH3027> of his neighbor,<WH7453> and his hand<WH3027> shall rise<WH5927> up against<WH5921> the hand<WH3027> of his neighbor.<WH7453>

And Judah<WH3063> also<WH1571> shall fight<WH3898> at Jerusalem;<WH3389> and the wealth<WH2428> of all<WH3605> the heathen<WH1471> round<WH5439> about<WH1157> shall be gathered<WH622> together, gold,<WH2091> and silver,<WH3701> and apparel,<WH899> in great<WH3966> abundance.<WH7230>

And so<WH3651> shall be the plague<WH4046> of the horse,<WH5483> of the mule,<WH6505> of the camel,<WH1581> and of the ass,<WH2543> and of all<WH3605> the beasts<WH929> that shall be in these<WH1992> tents,<WH4264> as this<WH2063> plague.<WH4046>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that every<WH3605> one that is left<WH3498> of all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> which came<WH935> against<WH5921> Jerusalem<WH3389> shall even go<WH5927> up from year<WH8141> to year<WH8141> to worship<WH7812> the King,<WH4428> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> and to keep<WH2287> the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles.<WH5521>

And it shall be, that whoever<WH834> will not come<WH5927> up of all the families<WH4940> of the earth<WH776> to Jerusalem<WH3389> to worship<WH7812> the King,<WH4428> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> even on them shall be no<WH3808> rain.<WH4306>

And if the family<WH4940> of Egypt<WH4714> go<WH5927> not up, and come<WH935> not, that have no<WH3808> rain; there shall be the plague,<WH4046> with which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> will smite<WH5062> the heathen<WH1471> that come<WH5927> not up to keep<WH2287> the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles.<WH5521>

This<WH2063> shall be the punishment<WH2403> of Egypt,<WH4714> and the punishment<WH2403> of all<WH3605> nations<WH1471> that come<WH5927> not up to keep<WH2287> the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles.<WH5521>

In that day<WH3117> shall there be on the bells<WH4698> of the horses,<WH5483> HOLINESS<WH6944> UNTO THE LORD;<WH3068> and the pots<WH5518> in the LORD's<WH3068> house<WH1004> shall be like the bowls<WH4219> before<WH6440> the altar.<WH4196>

Yes, every<WH3605> pot<WH5518> in Jerusalem<WH3389> and in Judah<WH3063> shall be holiness<WH6944> to the LORD<WH3068> of hosts:<WH6635> and all<WH3605> they that sacrifice<WH2076> shall come<WH935> and take<WH3947> of them, and seethe<WH1310> therein: and in that day<WH3117> there shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> the Canaanite<WH3669> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>
